introduction: This video will guide you through the basics of containerization and containerization platforms. It will explain what containers are, how they work, and how to create your own container. The video will cover the most well-supported container platform, Docker, and its dockerfile, as well as Kubernetes, a container orchestration tool for deploying and managing containers. It will also discuss the benefits of using containers and their deployment on cloud platforms. The video will provide a high-level synopsis of containerization and containerization platforms, and then break down the content into five sections, each with a title, content, and topics.
